segments.text: Looking at this scene, the overflowing sink makes me anxious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is cascading over the edge, soaking everything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman stands there, focused on her dish.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She has no idea about the flood at her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The puddle is spreading, and it's slippery.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now, the boy on the stool is stretching for cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That stool is tilting back dangerously.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: If he falls, it could be bad with all that water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, hand out for a cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're so innocent, but this is risky.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside seems so calm in comparison.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would notice and stop this chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's heartbreaking to watch potential disaster unfold.
segments.speaker: PAR
